pros: Opportunity to work in a company that makes a huge positive impact on the community. In addition you have access to world class music by world class musicians and who doesn't want to work in the Arts.
cons: Typical non-profit challenges of funding and organization capabilities but it's a great team. Lots of evening and weekend work which isn't for everyone but I loved it.
Appalling culture. Management lack communication skills. HR has no discretion for sensitive information. Incredibly low salaries even for the arts. Damaging to individual health and well-being.
